title: AGNN: Alternating Graph-Regularized Neural Networks to Alleviate Over-Smoothing. (arXiv:2304.07014v1 [cs.LG])
abstract: Graph Convolutional Network (GCN) with the powerful capacity to explore graph-structural data has gained noticeable success in recent years.
